description.value:
Granted Powers: You can manipulate lightning, mist, and wind, traffic with air creatures, and are resistant to electricity damage.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{Obscuring Mist}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{Wind Wall}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.e4v1uv8hexeu9sxj]{Air Walk}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{Control Winds}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{Chain Lightning}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{Elemental Body IV} (air only)
  • 8th— @Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{Whirlwind}
  • 9th— @Compendium[pf1.spells.pfy97qyneoa391ek]{Elemental Swarm} (air spell only)
